title: Sine and Cosine Graphs - comparing cosine values

content.question:
A point labeled P is marked on the circumference of the circle in quadrant 2.

An angle labeled theta is drawn between the positive x axis and radius O P.

​The figure shows the terminal ray of angle <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in standard position, intersecting the unit circle at point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses z close parentheses equals cos z"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>z</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. For the angle <math alttext="omega"><semantics><mi>ω</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (not shown), <math alttext="theta less than omega less than pi"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo><</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses omega close parentheses less than g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>ω</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses omega close parentheses greater than g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>ω</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses omega close parentheses equals g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>ω</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

Depending on the value of <math alttext="omega"><semantics><mi>ω</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, sometimes <math alttext="g open parentheses omega close parentheses less than g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>ω</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and sometimes <math alttext="g open parentheses omega close parentheses greater than g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>ω</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses omega close parentheses less than g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>ω</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
